field.name: Collaboration
field.definition: the partnership between the entities responsible for the intellectual content of the resource.

terms.termAndDeftn: all contributors to the intellectual content of the resource were UCAR employees at the time it was created
contributors to the intellectual content were UCAR employees and representatives from a university
contributors to the intellectual content were UCAR employees and representatives from a non-university institution
contributors to the intellectual content were UCAR employees, representatives from a university, and representatives from a non-university institution
either no contributors to the intellectual content were UCAR employees, or the work associated with the resource was done when a UCAR author was at an institution other than UCAR

dos.practice: While this field is optional, complete it if collaboration information is known.
Review acknowledgements and other supplementary sections for information and grant numbers.

donts.practice: Do not complete this field if is does not apply or collaboration information is sketchy or unknown.

examples.practice: UCAR, University and Other: COMET modules use UCAR, university and other govenment lab personnel to write the content.
